article:
'Walter Emil Friedrich August Migula' (born 1863 in Zyrowa (Oberschlesien, Gmina
Zdzieszowice); died 1938 in Eisenach) was a German botanist, who published many
articles on the subjects of cryptogamic botany, bacteriology, and plant
physiology. He is best remembered for his Kryptogamen-Flora von Deutschland, Deutsch-
Ãsterreich und der Schweiz (Cryptogamic Flora of Germany, Austria, and
Switzerland) and for describing the proteobacterial genus [[Pseudomonas]].
